DOC.brief_summary: The study intend test safety , tolerability , efficacy long-term treatment YM178 patient overactive bladder symptom .
DOC.brief_title: A Long-term Study YM178 Symptomatic Overactive Bladder Patients
DOC.criteria: Subject symptom overactive bladder > = 24 wks Subject experience frequency micturition average > = 8 time per 24 hr confirm 3day patient diary Subject breastfeeding , pregnant , intend become pregnant study Subject obviously stress incontinence Subject indwelling catheter practice intermittent self catheterization Subject evidence symptomatic urinary tract infection , interstitial cystitis , bladder stone , etc Subject average total daily urine volume > 3000 mL confirm patient diary Subject uncontrollable hypertension ( SBP > = 180 mmHg DBP > = 110 mmHg )
